Mukulu Maria Zita

Who is Mukulu Maria Zita?

She is a 22 year old female Ugandan.

She is a recent graduate of Makerere University, in a Bachelor's Degree of biomedical laboratory Technologist,


She recently discovered her passion in technology. She then enrolled for the code queen classes and was accepted to join in the 11th Cohort.

Mukulu is passionate about changing the world through her skills in technology that she has acquired during her time at the Code Queen.

Currently, she is proficient in html and CSS, where she has created various webpages, including this one

Her work is saved on Github, feel free to check it out.
